description: To provide financial assistance to UCO students who meet the criteria for the fund in order to foster their academic success. Eligibility Requirements Must be a currently enrolled UCO student Must be in good academic standing (Cumulative GPA 2.0) Must be a member of a Diversity Round Table group or the International Student Council, with preference to students who have or have had Deferred Action for Childhood Arrivals status or a similar program. Must have lived in the US for at least 5 years Must have attended a US high school Must submit a statement of financial need This scholarship is available to apply for during the Current UCO Student Application.

general_criteria.description: Soft requirements that provide additional points/consideration

hard_criteria.description: Hard requirements that must be met to qualify for the scholarship

criteria.description: Complete Application: "UCO Foundation Qualifying Scholarship Application"
